Parameters: String: the message to use for this exception, may be null
Throwable: the cause of the exception, may be null
DateTimeException(java.lang.String,java..Description: Constructs a new date-time exception with the specified message and cause.

Parameters: String: the message to use for this exception, may be null
DateTimeException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a new date-time exception with the specified message.

ClassDesc: Exception used to indicate a problem while calculating a date-time. This exception is used to indicate problems with creating, querying and manipulating date-time objects.
